translation:
Most Illustrious Sir

As the police of Jaguarão are besieged by the rebels, it is fitting that Your Lordship Your Lordship Sir of the 1st Battalion of Fusiliers; the first to arrive may Your Lordship

God keep Your Lordship Passo da Maria Gomes, June 23, 1844. Most Illustrious Sir Luís José Ferreira. Lieutenant-Colonel Commander of the Garrison of Pelotas. Francisco Pedro de Abreu.

The infantry must remain in Jaguarão until further orders or until the troops who will relieve them arrive.
